sys_update_xml.name: content_css_d7fafb024da0710062c55dc1f2a64ee3
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="content_css"><content_css action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><name>Branded CMS ServiceNow Overrides</name><style>/* Overriding default CMS/Iframed styles */

table, input, select, button, input.text, textarea, input.button {
	font-size: inherit;
	font-family: inherit;
}

/* Disabling Heisenberg */
.modal-backdrop { z-index: 0; }

@media (min-width: 550px) {
	.container {
		width: auto;
	}
}

/* Iframed forms and lists */
html[data-doctype=true] body[data-formName="ui_page_render"] { margin: 0; }
html[data-doctype=true] div.section_header_content_no_scroll { overflow: visible; }
div.form_title { font-size: 14px; }
.label { display: block; font-size: inherit; line-height: inherit; }
.label label { margin-bottom: 0; }

.breadcrumb { padding: 0; background: transparent; }

/* Service Catalog */
#category_description, #navigatordetailTop { display: none; }

.sc_category_item .details_div td,
.sc_category_item_hover .details_div td,
.catalog_description > table > tbody > tr > td { padding: 10px; }
.sc_category_item .details_div h3:first-child,
.sc_category_item_hover .details_div h3:first-child,
.catalog_description > table > tbody > tr > td > h3:first-child { margin-top: 0; }

/* Catalog Shopping Cart Container */
#cartContent { padding: 10px; border: 1px solid #ccc; }
.sc_cat_set_window, .sc_cart_window { margin: 0; border: 0 none; }
.sc_cart_window { min-width: 175px; width: 100% !important; }


/* Catalog Shopping Cart Top */
#cartContent_header { padding-bottom: 10px; }
#cart { padding: 0 10px; border: 0 none; }
#adder { border: 1px solid #CCC; margin-bottom: 10px; padding: 10px; }
#qty { margin-top: 10px; }

/* Catalog Shopping Cart Bottom */
.sc_cart_subtotal_row td { padding-top: 10px; }

/* Live Feed */
.main-content .live_feed_column { padding: 0; }

/* Bootstrap Buttons */
.btn-default:hover, .btn-destructive-subdued:hover, .btn-success-subdued:hover, .nav-segmented > li:hover, .btn-default.hover, .hover.btn-destructive-subdued, .hover.btn-success-subdued, .nav-segmented > li.hover { box-shadow: none; }</style><sys_class_name>content_css</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2014-11-24 17:14:12</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>true</sys_customer_update><sys_id>d7fafb024da0710062c55dc1f2a64ee3</sys_id><sys_mod_count>19</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Branded CMS ServiceNow Overrides</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>content_css_d7fafb024da0710062c55dc1f2a64ee3</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>kai.yao</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2015-02-23 13:12:50</sys_updated_on><type>local</type><url/></content_css></record_update>

(function( global, factory ) {

		// execute the factory and get jQuery

jQuery.extend = jQuery.fn.extend = function() {

	noop: function() {},

	isArray: Array.isArray || function( obj ) {

	isWindow: function( obj ) {

		return !jQuery.isArray( obj ) && (obj - parseFloat( obj ) + 1) >= 0;

		}

	},

	isPlainObject: function( obj ) {

sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="content_css"><content_css action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><name>Branded CMS Layout Styles (Mobile)</name><style>/* Mobile + Default Styles */

.page-title, .branded-admin-nav, #page_timing_div { display: none; }

/* Admin Bar */
.branded-admin-nav { z-index: 0; }
.navbar-inverse .navbar-brand:hover,
.navbar-inverse .navbar-brand:focus { color: #9d9d9d; }

/* Header */
.cms_header { padding-bottom: 20px; }

.cms_menu_super_menu_content {
	display: none;
	position: absolute;
	padding: 10px 15px;
	text-align: left;
	background: #fff;
	border: 1px solid #666;
	z-index: 1;
}

td.cms_header_top_menu { height: 40px; padding-bottom: 20px; line-height: 40px; }

.cms_header span.globalSearch { display: block; padding: 5px; margin-top: 5px; line-height: 20px; border: 1px solid #ccc; }
.cms_header span.globalSearch #sysparm_search { margin-left: 5px; width: 93%; }
.cms_header_login_link { text-align: right; }

.cms_header_resizer_link:last-child { margin-left: 10px; }

td.cms_header_logo, td.cms_header_text { display: block; }
div.cms_header_text { display: none; }

.cms_header_bottom_menu { position: relative; padding-top: 10px; }
.cms_header_bottom_menu .cms_menu_super_menu_bar_item,
.cms_header_bottom_menu .cms_menu_super_menu_bar_item_selected { float: left; }
.cms_header_bottom_menu .cms_menu_section_blocks_title h2 { margin: 0; line-height: 30px; }
.cms_header_bottom_menu .cms_menu_super_menu_bar_item:first-child .menu_section,
.cms_header_bottom_menu .cms_menu_super_menu_bar_item_selected:first-child .menu_section { padding-left: 0; }
.cms_header_bottom_menu .cms_menu_super_menu_bar .menu_section {
	display: block;
	padding: 0 15px;
	font-size: 20px;
	letter-spacing: 0.1em;
	line-height: 1.5;
	text-transform: uppercase;
}

.cms_header_bottom_menu .cms_menu_section_blocks_title h2,
.branded-chat-container {
	font-size: 16px;
	font-weight: 400;
	letter-spacing: 0.1em;
	text-transform: uppercase;
	vertical-align: middle;
}
.branded-chat-container { float: right; min-width: 280px; line-height: 60px; }
.branded-chat-avatar { float:right; margin-left: 10px; border-radius: 50%; }
.branded-chat-container .cms_menu_section_blocks_title h2 { display: none; }
.branded-chat-container .cms_menu_super_menu_content { min-width: 300px; }
.branded-chat-container > div { line-height: 60px; }
.branded-chat-department { line-height: 30px; }
.branded-icon-chat { margin-top: -2px; }
.branded-chat-link { margin-left: 5px; }

/* Home Page */
.page-home .carousel { display: none; }
.page-home .home-block-row a { color: #fff; }
.page-home .home-block-row .cms_menu_section_blocks {
	margin-bottom: 20px;
	color: #fff;
	-webkit-font-smoothing: antialiased;
	-moz-osx-font-smoothing: grayscale;
	background: #111;
}
.page-home .home-block-row .cms_menu_section_blocks:last-child { margin-bottom: 0; }

/* Home Pages */
.main-content .cms_menu_section_blocks { display: none !important; }
.main-content .row .cms_menu_section_blocks,
.main-content .home-block-row .cms_menu_section_blocks { display: block !important; }
.main-content .cms_menu_section_blocks .cms_menu_section_blocks_image_left { width: 90px; }
.main-content .cms_menu_section_blocks .cms_menu_section_blocks_title { padding-left: 20px; }
.main-content .cms_menu_section_blocks .cms_menu_section_blocks_title h2 {
	margin: 0;
	font-size: 22px;
	font-weight: 400;
	letter-spacing: 0.05em;
}
.main-content .cms_menu_section_blocks .cms_menu_second_level_text { letter-spacing: 0.05em; font-size: 12px; }
.main-content .cms_menu_section_blocks .cms_menu_separator { display: none; }
.main-content .cms_menu_section_blocks .main-content-menu-block-items { padding: 20px 0 40px 100px; }
.main-content .cms_menu_section_blocks .main-content-menu-block-items td { padding-bottom: 10px; }
.main-content .cms_menu_section_blocks .main-content-menu-block-items tr:last-child td { padding-bottom: 0; }
.main-content .cms_menu_section_blocks .menu_bullet { min-width: 20px; }
.main-content .cms_menu_section_blocks .cms_menu_block_item {
	display: block;
	margin-left: 10px;
	font-size: 18px;
}

.main-content .cms_menu_vertical_block .cms_menu_vertical_blocks_image_left { width: 90px; }
.main-content .cms_menu_vertical_block td.cms_menu_vertical_blocks_title { padding-left: 20px; }
.main-content .cms_menu_vertical_block .cms_menu_vertical_blocks_title h2 {
	margin: 0;
	font-size: 22px;
	font-weight: 400;
	letter-spacing: 0.05em;
	text-transform: uppercase;
}

/* Typeahead Search Bar */
.typeahead-search { margin: 0; }
.typeahead-search .input-group-btn { display: table-cell !important; }
.typeahead-search .twitter-typeahead { display: table-cell !important; width: 100%; }
.typeahead-search .typeahead-search-text {
	box-sizing: border-box;
	width: 100%;
	padding: 5px 30px 5px 10px;
	font-size: 16px;
	background: url( 'images/search_glass.gifx' ) no-repeat scroll 99% 8px;
	border: 1px solid #ccc;
	z-index: 0;
}
.typeahead-search-submit { visibility: hidden; width: 1px; height: 1px; position: absolute; top: -9999px; }

.tt-dropdown-menu {
	width: 100%;
	max-height: 250px;
	overflow-y: auto;
	box-sizing: border-box;
	border: 1px solid #ccc;
	font-size: 16px;
	background: #fff;
}
.tt-suggestion { padding: 10px; }
.typeahead-search-noresults { padding: 10px; width: 100%; color: #4c4c4c; }
.typeahead-search-suggestion-title {
	margin: 0;
	color: #4c4c4c;
	font-size: 16px;
	font-weight: normal;
	line-height: 1.2;
}
.typeahead-search-suggestion-text {
	overflow: hidden;
	margin: 0;
	color: #999;
	font-size: 14px;
	font-weight: 300;
	line-height: 1.5;
	text-overflow: ellipsis;
	max-height: 37px;
}

.tt-suggestion.tt-cursor { background: #278EFC; }
.tt-suggestion.tt-cursor .typeahead-search-suggestion-title { color: #fff; }
.tt-suggestion.tt-cursor .typeahead-search-suggestion-text { color: #fff; }

/* Iframe pages */
.branded-page-title {
	margin: 20px 0 20px;
	font-size: 24px;
	letter-spacing: 0.05em;
	line-height: 1;
	text-transform: uppercase;
}
#catalog_frame, #support_frame { margin-top: 20px; }

/* Get Help */
.page-get_help .main-content > .row { display: none; }
.branded-gethelp-selection-container { margin: 20px 0 10px; }
.branded-gethelp-label { margin-right: 15px; }
.branded-gethelp-selection-container .btn-group { display: inline-block !important; }
.branded-gethelp-selection-container .caret { float: right; position: relative; top: 10px; }
.branded-gethelp-selection-container .branded-gethelp-dropdown { width: 100%; }
.branded-gethelp-selection-container .branded-gethelp-dropdown-button { width: 210px; padding: 10px 20px; text-align: left; }
.branded-gethelp-selection-container .branded-gethelp-dropdown-button:hover { box-shadow: none; }

/* Support Pages */
.page-it_support .main-content .cms_menu_section_blocks .cms_menu_section_blocks_title h2,
.page-hr_support .main-content .cms_menu_section_blocks .cms_menu_section_blocks_title h2,
.page-facilities_support .main-content .cms_menu_section_blocks .cms_menu_section_blocks_title h2 { font-size: 18px; }
.page-it_support .main-content .cms_menu_section_blocks .cms_menu_section_blocks_image_left,
.page-hr_support .main-content .cms_menu_section_blocks .cms_menu_section_blocks_image_left,
.page-facilities_support .main-content .cms_menu_section_blocks .cms_menu_section_blocks_image_left { width: 60px; }

/* knowledge/catalog */
.branded-main-container { padding-top: 40px; }
.branded-section-title {
	margin: 0;
	font-size: 18px;
	letter-spacing: 0.05em;
	text-transform: uppercase;
}

/* knowledge search styles */
.branded-knowledge-filters-title,
.branded-knowledge-feed-title {
	margin: 0;
	font-size: 18px;
	letter-spacing: 0.05em;
	text-transform: uppercase;
}
.branded-knowledge-topic-filters-title,
.branded-knowledge-helpful-title { margin-top: 40px; }
.branded-knowledge-filters-list,
.branded-knowledge-feed-list { padding-left: 0; list-style-type: none; }
.branded-knowledge-filter { margin-top: 10px; }
.branded-knowledge-filter-toggle { color: #999; font-size: 16px; }
.branded-knowledge-filter-toggle:hover { color: #337AB7; }
.branded-knowledge-filter-check { color: #337AB7; margin-right: 5px; }

.branded-knowledge-feed { text-align: right; }
.branded-knowledge-feed-item { display: none; margin-top: 20px; }
.branded-knowledge-feed-item.active.top-result { display: block; }
.branded-knowledge-feed-item-link { color: #999; }

.branded-knowledge-results { overflow: auto; max-height: 670px; }
.branded-knowledge-article { margin-top: 40px; }
.branded-knowledge-article:last-child { margin-bottom: 0; }
.branded-knowledge-article-title { margin: 0; }
.branded-knowledge-article-summary {
	margin: 5px 0;
	color: #666;
	white-space: nowrap;
	overflow: hidden;
	text-overflow: ellipsis;
}
.branded-knowledge-article-meta { line-height: 20px; }
.branded-knowledge-article-meta::after { display: block; clear: both; content: ' '; }
.branded-knowledge-article-meta-info { float: left; color: #888; font-size: 12px; }
.branded-knowledge-article-meta-social { float: right; }
.branded-knowledge-article-meta-votes { margin-right: 20px; }
.branded-knowledge-article-meta-votes .glyphicon-thumbs-up { margin-left: 5px; }

.branded-knowledge-modal .modal-title-rating { margin-left: 10px; color: #999; font-size: 14px; }
.branded-knowledge-modal .modal-title-rating .branded-knowledge-modal-rating-star { margin-right: 2px; }
.branded-knowledge-modal .modal-body { overflow: auto; }
.branded-knowledge-modal .modal-body img { max-width: 100%; }
.branded-knowledge-modal-comments-title,
.branded-knowledge-modal-comments { text-align: left; }
.branded-knowledge-modal-comments-title { margin-top: 20px; margin-bottom: 15px; line-height: 1; }
.branded-knowledge-modal-makecomment-post { margin-top: 10px; }
.branded-knowledge-modal-makecomment-post[disabled] { color: #fff; }
.branded-knowledge-modal-comment {
	margin-top: 20px;
	padding: 10px 15px;
	background: #fafbfc;
	border: 1px solid #ccc;
	border-radius: 4px;
}
.branded-knowledge-modal-comment:first-child { margin-top: 0; }
.branded-knowledge-modal-comment-user-name { color: #005097; font-size: 18px; }
.branded-knowledge-modal-comment-date { margin-left: 10px; color: #999; font-size: 12px; }
.branded-knowledge-modal-comment-text { margin-bottom: 0; }

/* knowledge article page styles */
.branded-knowledge-title { margin-bottom: 0; }
.branded-knowledge-subtitle {
	margin-bottom: 20px;
	color: #666;
	font-size: 20px;
	letter-spacing: 0.05em;
	line-height: 1.5;
}

/* Catalog Home styles */
.branded-catalog-container { padding-top: 20px; }

.branded-catalog-main { padding-top: 20px; }
.branded-catalog-main-list,
.branded-catalog-secondary-list { list-style-type: none; padding: 0; }

.branded-requested-title,
.branded-related-title,
.branded-mostrequested-title { margin-bottom: 20px; text-transform: none; }

.branded-main-item-link,
.branded-secondary-item-link { display: block; }
.branded-main-item { margin-bottom: 30px; }
.branded-main-item-link {
	height: 170px;
	padding: 30px 10px;
	text-align: center;
	border: 1px solid #ccc;
}
.branded-main-item-image { min-width: 50px; max-width: 100%; }
.branded-main-item-title {
	overflow: hidden;
	padding-top: 10px;
	max-height: 70px;
}

.branded-catalog-modal .modal-dialog { width: 900px; }
.branded-catalog-modal .modal-body { min-height: 700px; }
.branded-catalog-modal .branded-catalog-modal-iframe { min-height: 660px; }

/*.branded-mostrequested { padding: 20px; background-color: #f1f2f3; }
.branded-secondary-item { margin-top: 10px; padding-bottom: 10px; }
.branded-secondary-item-link {
	height: 100px;
	background: #ccc;
	border: 1px solid #999;
}*/

.kb-list-article { margin-bottom: 20px; }
.kb-list-article-views,
.kb-list-article-votes { text-align: center; }
.kb-list-article-views.not-viewed,
.kb-list-article-votes.not-useful { color: #999; }
.kb-list-article-views.viewed { color: inherit; }
.kb-list-article-views.viewed .kb-list-article-views-content { border-color: #333; }
.kb-list-article-votes.useful { color: #7ac143; }
.kb-list-article-votes.useful .kb-list-article-votes-content { border-color: #7ac143; }
.kb-list-article-views-content,
.kb-list-article-votes-content { padding: 15px 0; border: 1px solid #f1f1f1; }
.kb-list-article-views-value,
.kb-list-article-votes-value { font-weight: bold; }
.kb-list-article-text div:empty { display: none; }
.kb-list-article-short-description { margin: 0; font-size: 16px; }
.kb-list-article-description {
	overflow: hidden;
	margin: 5px 0;
	text-overflow: ellipsis;
	white-space: nowrap;
}
.kb-list-article-meta { color: #999; font-size: 12px; }
.kb-list-article-author-name { font-weight: bold; }

/* Footer */
.branded-footer {
	margin-top: 40px;
	padding-top: 40px;
	padding-bottom: 40px;
	font-size: 12px;
	font-weight: 500;
	letter-spacing: 0.05em;
	text-transform: uppercase;
	border-top: 1px solid #ddd;
}
.branded-footer-left,
.branded-footer-right { text-align: center; }
</style><sys_class_name>content_css</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2014-11-21 08:55:40</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>true</sys_customer_update><sys_id>152c224d4de8310062c55dc1f2a64e72</sys_id><sys_mod_count>197</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Branded CMS Layout Styles (Mobile)</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>content_css_152c224d4de8310062c55dc1f2a64e72</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>kai.yao</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2015-02-27 11:16:40</sys_updated_on><type>local</type><url/></content_css></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: menu_section_4834ea6d9b0231003fe61c760654989d
sys_update_xml.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="menu_section"><menu_section action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><category/><contains_menu display_value="Branded CMS Legal Home Menu">7e5ef2204fae7100ce7522788310c75d</contains_menu><content_block_menu display_value="Branded CMS Main Menu">182e9ac94de8310062c55dc1f2a64e4c</content_block_menu><db_left_menu_image/><db_right_menu_image/><detail_page display_value="Branded CMS - Legal Home">51fabaec4f6e7100ce7522788310c79f</detail_page><footer/><header/><iframe/><image/><image_right/><logged_on>false</logged_on><menu_section_color/><name>Legal</name><omit_body>false</omit_body><order>200</order><roles/><second_level_text/><sys_class_name>menu_section</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2015-02-05 11:11:53</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>true</sys_customer_update><sys_id>4834ea6d9b0231003fe61c760654989d</sys_id><sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Legal</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>menu_section_4834ea6d9b0231003fe61c760654989d</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>anwesh.rijal</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2015-02-27 07:14:58</sys_updated_on><tag/><target>internal</target><type>content_page</type><url/></menu_section><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=4834ea6d9b0231003fe61c760654989d"/></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: content_css_b1c72538b134310062c560307f64330f
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="content_css"><content_css action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><name>Branded CMS Custom Theme</name><style>/*********
Here you can apply custom color theming to the Branded CMS Template.

For a nice way to experiment with colors, see https://color.adobe.com/create/color-wheel/. An even simpler color picker can be found at http://colorpicker.com/.
*********/

/* General Link Styles */
a {
	color: #337AB7;
	transition: color 200ms;
}
a:hover { /* When the mouse is hovering over a link */
	color: #278EFC;
	text-decoration: none; /* removes underlines when hovering */
}
a:active, a:focus { /* When the mouse is in the middle of a click or just after a link has been clicked */
	color: #337AB7;
	text-decoration: underline;
}

.cms_header_bottom_menu a { /* Main Menu Links */
	color: #777;
}
.cms_header_bottom_menu a:hover {
	color: #337AB7;
}</style><sys_class_name>content_css</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>kai.yao</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2014-12-02 19:46:55</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>true</sys_customer_update><sys_id>b1c72538b134310062c560307f64330f</sys_id><sys_mod_count>21</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Branded CMS Custom Theme</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>content_css_b1c72538b134310062c560307f64330f</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>kai.yao</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2015-02-23 08:16:32</sys_updated_on><type>local</type><url/></content_css></record_update>

ce5b99904de4310062c55dc1f2a64e73 var record = new GlideRecord( 'kb_knowledge' ), kbTitle, kbText; record.addQuery( 'sys_id', '${current.sys_id}' ); record.query(); while ( record.next() ) { kbTitle = record.short_description; kbText = record.text; }

Knowledge Article

${kbTitle}

${kbText}
]]>936e1d74b134310062c560307f643329 var msg; if (0 >= gs.dateDiff(current.published, current.sys_updated_on.getGlideObject().getDate(), true)) msg = "${gs.getMessage('Published')} " + current.published; else { msg = "${gs.getMessage('Updated')} "; var d1 = current.sys_updated_on.getGlideObject().getRaw(); var d2 = Packages.com.glide.glideobject.GlideDateTime().getRaw(); var diff = gs.dateDiff(current.sys_updated_on.getDisplayValue(), gs.nowDateTime(), true); if (3600 * 12 > diff) { var s = Packages.com.glide.ui.jelly.tags.mergedata.HistoryTag2().translatedTimeDifferenceString(d2, d1); if (s == null) msg += "${gs.getMessage('just now')}"; else msg += s.toLowerCase() + '${gs.getMessage(" ago")}'; } else { var session = gs.getSession(); var tf = session.getTimeFormat(); session.setTimeFormat(" "); msg += trim(current.sys_updated_on.getDisplayValue()); session.setTimeFormat(tf); } } msg; var thisAttachment = null; var sa = new GlideRecord('sys_attachment'); sa.addQuery('table_name', current.getTableName()); sa.addQuery('table_sys_id', current.getUniqueValue()); sa.query(); while (sa.next()) { var at = new Object(); at.name = sa.file_name + ''; at.sys_id = sa.sys_id + ''; thisAttachment = at; } ${current.short_description.getDisplayValue()}
${jvar_time_text}

sys_update_xml.name: content_css_b985af214dec310062c55dc1f2a64e86
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="content_css"><content_css action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><name>Branded CMS Bootstrap Overrides</name><style>/* Concessions made to Bootstrap Styles because of ServiceNow's layout engine. */

/* Fade Carousel */
.carousel .carousel-inner .item { display: block; opacity: 0; transition: opacity 1.5s; }
.carousel .carousel-inner .active { opacity: 1; }
.carousel .carousel-inner .left,
.carousel .carousel-inner .right { left: 0; }
.carousel .carousel-inner > .item.prev,
.carousel .carousel-inner > .item.active.left { transform: none; -webkit-transform: none; }

/* Margins for columns have to be changed for table cells (margins don't affect them) */
td.row > table > thead > tr > th[class*="col-"]:first-child,
td.row > table > tbody > tr > td[class*="col-"]:first-child,
td.row > div[class*="col-"]:first-child {
	padding-left: 0;
}

td.row > table > thead > tr > th[class*="col-"]:last-child,
td.row > table > tbody > tr > td[class*="col-"]:last-child,
td.row > div[class*="col-"]:last-child {
	padding-right: 0;
}</style><sys_class_name>content_css</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2014-11-23 02:25:43</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>true</sys_customer_update><sys_id>b985af214dec310062c55dc1f2a64e86</sys_id><sys_mod_count>14</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Branded CMS Bootstrap Overrides</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>content_css_b985af214dec310062c55dc1f2a64e86</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>kai.yao</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2015-02-18 14:31:19</sys_updated_on><type>local</type><url/></content_css></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: content_block_programmatic_5a1637d44f2e7100ce7522788310c7b4
sys_update_xml.payload:
truegeneralfalsefalseBranded CMS Catalog Home Block var catalogItems = new GlideRecord( 'sc_cat_item' ), catalogItemImages = []; catalogItems.query(); while ( catalogItems.next() ) { catalogItemImages.push( { sys_id : catalogItems.sys_id.getDisplayValue(), image : catalogItems.image.getDisplayValue(), icon : catalogItems.icon.getDisplayValue() } ); }

sys_update_xml.name: sys_ui_script_ce7625079b0231003fe61c7606549830
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ui_script"><sys_ui_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><description>This script loads the layout/bootstrapping for the Branded CMS template as well as any custom functionality using various JS libraries.</description><global>false</global><name>branded-cms-init</name><script><![CDATA[// This script loads the layout/bootstrapping for the Branded CMS template as well as any custom functionality using various JS libraries.
var jquery;

( function( $j ) {
	var requireConfig = {
			deps : [ 'jquery', 'brandedlayout' ],

			paths : {
				'jquery' : '/branded-jquery.min.jsdbx?dummy_ext=',
				'bootstrap' : '/bootstrap.min.jsdbx?dummy_ext=',
				'underscore' : '/branded-lodash.jsdbx?dummy_ext=',
				'backbone' : '/branded-backbone.jsdbx?dummy_ext=',
				'infinitescroll' : '/jquery.infinitescroll.min.jsdbx?dummy_ext=',
				'brandedlayout' : '/branded-cms-layout.jsdbx?dummy_ext=',
				'brandedgethelp' : '/branded-get-help.jsdbx?dummy_ext=',
				'brandedtypeaheadbundle' : '/branded-typeahead.bundle.jsdbx?dummy_ext=',
				'brandedtypeaheadsetup' : '/branded-typeahead-setup.jsdbx?dummy_ext=',
				'brandedknowledgesearch' : '/branded-knowledge-search.jsdbx?dummy_ext=',
				'brandedknowledgearticle' : '/branded-knowledge-article.jsdbx?dummy_ext=',
				'brandedcatalog' : '/branded-catalog.jsdbx?dummy_ext='
			},

			shim : {
				'brandedlayout' : { 'deps' : [ 'jquery' ] },
				'bootstrap' : { 'deps' : [ 'jquery' ] }
			},

			callback : function() {
				jquery = jQuery.noConflict();
			}
		};

	$j.getScript( '/require.jsdbx' ).done( function() {
		var pathJsMap = {
				'/branded/get_help.do' : 'brandedgethelp',
				'/branded/knowledge_search.do' : 'brandedknowledgesearch',
				'/branded/knowledge.do' : 'brandedknowledgearticle',
				'/branded/service_catalog.do' : 'brandedcatalog'
			};

		requirejs.config( requireConfig );

		if ( pathJsMap[ window.location.pathname ] ) {
			requirejs( [ pathJsMap[ window.location.pathname ] ], function() {} );
		}
	} );
} )( jQuery );]]></script><script_name/><sys_class_name>sys_ui_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2015-02-09 22:33:32</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>true</sys_customer_update><sys_id>ce7625079b0231003fe61c7606549830</sys_id><sys_mod_count>33</sys_mod_count><sys_name>branded-cms-init</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ui_script_ce7625079b0231003fe61c7606549830</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>kai.yao</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2015-02-26 18:55:15</sys_updated_on><use_scoped_format>false</use_scoped_format></sys_ui_script></record_update>
